title: The Notebook
overview: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman...
tagline: Behind every great love is a great story.

title: Pride & Prejudice
overview: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy.
tagline: A romance ahead of its time.

title: La La Land
overview: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love...
tagline: Here's to the fools who dream.

title: Titanic
overview: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist...
tagline: Nothing on Earth could come between them.

title: Call Me by Your Name
overview: In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and an older man...
tagline: Is it better to speak or to die?

title: The Fault in Our Stars
overview: Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey...
tagline: One sick love story.

title: Se7en
overview: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
tagline: Seven deadly sins. Seven ways to die.

title: Gone Girl
overview: With his wife's disappearance becoming a media circus, a man is thrust under suspicion.
tagline: You don't know what you've got 'til it's...

title: The Silence of the Lambs
overview: A young FBI cadet seeks help from a brilliant psychiatrist and cannibal...
tagline: To enter the mind of a killer she must challenge the mind of a madman.

title: Shutter Island
overview: Teddy Daniels investigates a psychiatric facility on Shutter Island...
tagline: Someone is missing.

title: Prisoners
overview: When Keller Dover's daughter goes missing, he takes matters into his own hands...
tagline: Every moment matters.

title: Zodiac
overview: A cartoonist becomes obsessed with tracking the Zodiac killer in San Francisco.
tagline: There's more than one way to lose your life to a killer.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
overview: A Hobbit and eight companions begin a journey to destroy the One Ring.
tagline: One ring to rule them all.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
overview: A boy discovers he's a wizard and begins his magical education.
tagline: Let the magic begin.

title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
overview: Bilbo Baggins joins a group of dwarves on a quest to reclaim treasure from a dragon.
tagline: From the smallest beginnings come the greatest legends.

title: Avatar
overview: A marine on an alien world becomes torn between duty and protecting the native people.
tagline: Enter the world.

title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
overview: Four kids discover a magical land and join a mystical lion to save it from darkness.
tagline: Evil has reigned for 100 years...

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
overview: A pirate and a blacksmith team up to rescue a woman from cursed sailors.
tagline: Prepare to be blown out of the water.

title: The Lion King
overview: A young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility.
tagline: Life's greatest adventure is finding your place in the Circle of Life.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The story of an extraordinary man living through historic American events.
tagline: Life is like a box of chocolates.

title: Whiplash
overview: A young drummer is pushed to his limits by an abusive music instructor.
tagline: The road to greatness can take you to the edge.

title: Spirited Away
overview: A young girl is trapped in a mysterious world of spirits and gods.
tagline: A journey beyond imagination.

title: Bohemian Rhapsody
overview: The rise of the band Queen and the life of its lead singer, Freddie Mercury.
tagline: Fearless lives forever.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
overview: The adventures of a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel.
tagline: A murder case of scandalous proportions.
